trans-unit.source: An <see langword="abstract" /> base class for the exceptions that are thrown if an attempt is made to access the body of a message when it is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 當存取訊息本文的嘗試未獲得允許時，所擲回之例外狀況的 <see langword="abstract" /> 基底類別 (Base Class)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When building a custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> it is the responsibility of the implementer to pass the relevant parameters to the constructor called to throw the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 當建置自訂 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 時，將相關參數傳遞給呼叫之建構函式來擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 是實作器的責任。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />，包含所擲回之例外狀況的相關序列化物件資料。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" /> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含有關來源或目的端內容資訊的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class with serialized and contextual information specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的已序列化內容資訊，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When building a custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> it is the responsibility of the implementer to pass the relevant parameters to the constructor called to throw the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 當建置自訂 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 時，將相關參數傳遞給呼叫之建構函式來擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 是實作器的責任。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When building a custom <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> it is the responsibility of the implementer to pass the relevant parameters to the constructor called to throw the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" />.
trans-unit.target: 當建置自訂 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilterTable`1" /> 時，將相關參數傳遞給呼叫之建構函式來擲回 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InvalidBodyAccessException" /> 是實作器的責任。
